attributes.action: NEVER PUT BRITISH BOOTS IN SYRIA
attributes.additional_details:
I would like to see all male refugees aged 16-50, who have fled Syria, do 6 weeks Army training,sent back to Syria to fight for their own country,therefore avoiding the need to claim benefits & free NHS care,
 therefore avoiding the need for UK to put troops on the ground. After all, these people didn't mind risking their lives to get to Europe and were fit enough to walk hundreds of miles after arriving in Europe.
attributes.background:
Click this link to sign the petition:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/115518/sponsors/Bk2a8UG4KRV7xXCO2IA

Don't put British Troops on the ground in Syria ever.
Male refugees aged 16-50 who have fled Syria to the UK, do 6 weeks basic Army training.

rejection.details: The decision to join the armed forces is one for an individual to take, not for the Government or Parliament to decide on.
